name: Bumper Kart Hockey Free
description:
What do you get when you combine BUMPER CARS and AIR HOCKEY? Absurdly fun and competitive action, unlike any hockey game on the App Store!

Take the wheel of your Bumper Kart, a hovering disc-shaped go-kart, then bump and smack your way to victory! The rules are simple, use your kart to knock the hockey puck into the opposing goal as many times as you can!

You can compete with other players around the world in live head-to-head online matches, or test your skills against computer opponents. When you’re ready for a new challenge, you can race the clock in the frantic 60-second “Long Shot” and “Multi-Puck Dash” modes!

Check out these features!

• Online Multiplayer - all you need is your Game Center account
• Single Player vs Computer, with 3 difficulty levels
• Single Player Challenges, with Game Center leaderboards
• Intuitive controls - tilt to steer and touch to go
• MFi game controller support!
• Bumpin’ music tracks
